infos.value: This shall do.
Let us set up our encampment here.
Does Your Highness expect this battle to last some time?
I should hope not. Yet we may be left with little other choice...
I have a notion.
...Darling, don't—
I ask your permission to advance «Solidus» to the castle!
...I forbid it.
Please, King Robb!
While we may not be prepared for battle, neither is our enemy.
We should seize this chance while we have it!
Do not take the Lion's Den lightly.
I believe the Leonis forces will return.
Having them here would certainly be reassuring...
Silence, Lorenzo!
We should not count on Leonis to act as our ally.
Should they come baring their fangs at us...
Frederika, Lorenzo. Begin preparations immediately.
Darling...are you sure?
I am.
You cannot put your faith in Leonis?
I cannot entrust them with Schuzelt. That is all.
Forgive my insolence. I will accept whatever punishment you deem appropriate. But now...
Sadali is said to now be in possession of four ancient relics.
Do not act in haste. The well-being of your soldiers should be of upmost importance. Do I make myself clear?
Then...you mean...
That is my only order. I leave the rest in your hands.
We have received His Highness's permission.
Now we invade Leonis Castle and recover Lady Machérie! Move out!
